title: Return events based on search paramater
name: GetEvent
description: This one can be used to search for events based on the title it returns one item as a JSON.

title: Request all events from database
name: GetEvents
description: This one is used to get all events from the database. it returns a JSON containing the data.

title: post new event
name: PostEvent
description: This is used to post a new event to the database it redirects to main page if successful, if not it sends an error message
